name: Melee Area Damage
description: Adds a new Melee Area Damage item property.
author: olegbl

config.name: Damage
config.description: Percentage of weapon damage that affects enemies in an area.

config.name: Damage Reduction
config.description: Area damage also applies to the initial target hit, so overall damage should be reduced to maintain balance. This value controls how much reduction there is. 0 = no reduction (area damage makes you kill single targets faster). 100 = balanced (no change in damage output against single targets). 200 = your damage is reduced by twice the amount of area damage you will do.

config.name: Radius
config.description: The radius of the area damage around the target that the melee attack hit. 2 = hit adjacent enemies. 4 = hit enemies even behind you. 100 = just hit everything on screen.

config.name: Small Charms
config.description: Spawn area damage affixes on small charms.

config.name: Large Charms
config.description: Spawn area damage affixes on large charms.

config.name: Grand Charms
config.description: Spawn area damage affixes on grand charms.

config.name: Unique Small Charm
config.description: Adds a unique small charm with the affix to Gheed's shop.
